post.post_content: This offer is valid only for those customer who are existing customer of Dish TV, then they can purchase a child connection for another TV. Dish TV, India’s pioneer and first direct to home entertainment service, is a division of Zee Entertainment Enterprises, the largest media and general television entertainment network with a wide range of business.Dish TV is Asia’s largest DTH Company and is poised to touch a landmark on becoming one of the top DTH companies in the world. It was the first company to launch DTH service in the country and it changed the face of Indian television viewing by making digital entertainment accessible. Dish TV uses three satellites to broadcast Hi-Definition and Standard Definition signals to provide enhanced viewing experience.Digital Picture Quality & Stereophonic SoundDigital picture quality and stereophonic sound: providing the customer with smooth viewing experience with DVD picture quality and sound system that feels like a theatre.Geographic MobilityNo matter which part of the country you are in or moving to, Dish TV with its all India coverage ensures digital entertainment wherever you are.  Thus providing customers’ with uninterrupted services and nonstop access to entertainment.Dyna BoostDish TV is using the NSS6 satellite at 95.0°E designed specifically for DTH operations. It is equipped with Automatic Level Control (ALC) feature that enables the satellite to maintain constant satellite EIRP even in case of uplink signal degradation due to weather conditions such as rain, fog or clouds.Wide range of productsDish TV provides three kinds of Set Top Boxes namely Dish truHD+ with recorder, Dish + with recorder and standard definition  box . Dish truHD+  provides hi- definition signals for life like  picture quality along with the power to pause, record and rewind live TV . With Dish+ you can record the programmes of your choice in standard definition.Recharge offersDish TV offers various recharge offers as per customer’s convenience, the packs are designed to provide value for money to customers where they can select and pay for channels of their choice. It also provides customers with instant recharge, where they can recharge their packs in no time. There are also various modes of payment customers can opt for like online payment, from home, or by visiting nearby dealersMovies on DemandFor the first time in the history of entertainment industry viewers can order movies on TV. With MOD the subscribers can order a movie when they want. Today, Dish TV is the only platform that offers blockbuster Bollywood & Hollywood movies and recent addition to the MOD library is regional language titles in Tamil, Telugu and Kannad languages.ServicesDish TV has 24* 7 call centre across the country to take care of subscriber requirements at any point of time. Thus any complaints and grievances are met immediately, as Dish TV believes in customer satisfaction.

post.post_content:
Don’t let anything stand between you and your training. This ultra-soft sherpa jacket is a handy outer layer that you can throw on to stay snug on your way to and from your workout session. It features PUMA’s dryCELL moisture-wicking technology to keep you feeling comfortable and cool, every step of your day.

  • dryCELL: Performance technology designed to wick moisture from the body and keep you free of sweat during exercise

post.post_title: Waxed Stormwear™ Faux Fur Lined Parka Coat
post.post_content: Reach for this waxed pure cotton parka in wet weather. It has a regular fit, with a drawstring waist for a flattering shape. Stormwear™technology keeps you dry, while large fleece-lined pockets make sure your hands stay cosy. The whole coat is lined with faux fur for an exceptionally cosy feel and we've added a fluffy trim around the adjustable drawstring hood. A zipped fastening helps to lock in warmth and the concealed internal pocket is ideal for carrying essentials. We only ever use responsibly sourced cotton for our clothes. M&S Collection: easy-to-wear wardrobe staples that combine classic and contemporary styles.

post.post_title: Waterproof Hooded Parka Coat
post.post_content: This lightweight parka coat is perfect for layering and is crafted from technical waterproof fabric to keep wet weather at bay. It's cut in a regular fit and fastens with a zip and poppers for easy wear. Taped seams keep water firmly out, while contrast drawstrings at the waist, hem and hood can be adjusted for a snug fit. It's fully lined with mesh for breathability, with two fleece-lined side pockets to keep your hands cosy. Concealed zip pockets inside and out offer places to keep your essentials close. M&S Collection: easy-to-wear wardrobe staples that combine classic and contemporary styles.

post.post_title: Pure Wool A-Line Coat
post.post_content: Pure wool fabric gives this Jaeger coat a subtle lustre and indulgently smooth feel. The smart A-line style comes in a regular fit, with a neatly tailored lapel neckline. Three buttons through the front create a modern look. It's lined for comfort. Use it to give a formal touch to denim and t-shirts.

Prolyte ORS Powder Refreshing Orange (Cipla Health Ltd)
ORS Powder is a WHO based ORS (Oral Rehydration Salt) formula. Oral rehydration salt is a combination of Dextrose and a number of essential electrolytes (Sodium Chloride, Potassium Chloride, Sodium Citrate). ORS Powder restores body fluids & electrolytes, lost due to dehydration in during Diarrhea, vomiting, muscle cramping, and exertional heat illness while exercising in hot or humid weather. 
 
Key Ingredients:
Dextrose
Sodium Citrate
Acidity Regulator
Potassium Chloride
Sodium Chloride
Trisodium citrate dihydrate 
Key Benefits:
Sodium chloride is utilized by body cells for its normal function
Potassium is an extremely important electrolyte that functions in the maintenance of water balance and distribution, acid-base balance, muscle and nerve cell function, heart function, kidney and adrenal function
Dextrose anhydrous is the purest form of dextrose, commonly called glucose. Dextrose anhydrous provides instant energy. It is the primary ingredient in oral rehydration salts (ORS)
Trisodium citrate dihydrate is a tribasic salt of citric acid. It is produced by complete neutralization of citric acid with high purity sodium source and subsequent crystallization
Directions For Use:
Dissolve the contents of the packet in the amount of drinking water indicated on the packet, usually 1 litre
If drinking water is not available, or if you are not sure the water is drinkable, boil the water for at least 10 minutes and then let cool
Stir well, and give to the child to drink in a cup or spoon-feed
Note: Be careful to mix the right amount of water. If you use too little water, the drink could make the diarrhoea worse
Safety Information:
Read the label carefully before use
Store in a cool dry place away from direct sunlight
Keep out of reach of the children

This medicine is considered safe for consumption by pregnant and breastfeeding women. Your doctor will prescribe an appropriate dose based on your clinical condition.

Interaction with alcohol is unknown. It is advisable to consult your doctor before consumption.

There are no well-established studies to back up the onset of the effects of this medicine. However, it is best to consult with your doctor first.

post.post_title: Everteen Natural Intimate Wash with Witch Hazel for Moms
post.post_content:
Everteen Natural Intimate Wash with Witch Hazel for Moms is especially useful for middle-aged and elderly women who want everyday freshness and protection naturally. The pH level of your vulva is restored and balanced by a mild, yet highly efficient cleanser. Everteen Witch Hazel Natural Intimate Wash offers great protection against fungal, bacterial and yeast infections for your intimate area. It also helps to combat inflammation and decrease skin irritation, while keeping the skin soft and well-nourished.
Key Ingredients:


Witch Hazel



Neem



Sea Buckthorn



Tea Tree Oil



Aloe Vera



Base to Q.S.


Key Benefits:


Everteen Witch Hazel Intimate Wash is specially formulated to keep in mind the unique needs of mothers, middle-aged, and elderly women



Natural ingredients in this Everteen wash maintain a healthy balanced pH and prevent bad odour



Witch hazel is known for its natural astringent properties that help tighten skin and control postpartum tears by reducing pain and inflammation



Neem, tea tree oil, sea buckthorn and aloe vera are excellent skincare botanicals that provide skin nourishment and offer protection against bacterial, fungal and yeast infections, inflammation, itching and irritation



It helps manage bacterial vaginosis in women, which is often misdiagnosed as yeast infection and can cause persistent intimate discomfort if left untreated



Everteen Witch Hazel Intimate Wash is a quality product from Everteen. The leader and pioneer in complete feminine intimate care offer a range of products for women’s health and hygiene


Directions For Use:


Wash your intimate area and hands with clean water



Apply Everteen Witch Hazel Natural Intimate Wash on the external intimate skin area and rinse thoroughly with water



Use daily during morning shower and at night before sleep


Safety Information:


Read the label carefully before use



Keep out of reach of the children



Store in a cool dry place



After using the witch hazel intimate wash, rinse it off thoroughly with water



In case of contact with the eyes, wash it off immediately with plenty of clean water
